title: Social Media Snapshots From the WAGs
headline: Social Media Snapshots From the WAGs
description: It's not just the pros who like to document their off-course moments on social media! Here are some snapshots from Tour wives and girlfriends like Kandi Mahan, Lindsey Vonn and Amanda Dufner.
